28.eng-name: The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported:There came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) eight persons from the tribe of 'Ukl, but with this addition that he did not cauterise (the wounds which hid been inflicted upon them while punishing them)

chapter.eng-name: The ruling on Muharibin and Apostates
